Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BootSeq.description: The array containing possible values for attributes of type 'OrderedList'.
BootSeq.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing the possible values of an attribute of type 'OrderedList'.

HddSeq.description: The array containing possible values for attributes of type 'OrderedList'.
HddSeq.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing the possible values of an attribute of type 'OrderedList'.

OneTimeBootMode.description: The array containing possible values for attributes of type 'OrderedList'.
OneTimeBootMode.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing the possible values of an attribute of type 'OrderedList'.

UefiBootSeq.description: The array containing possible values for attributes of type 'OrderedList'.
UefiBootSeq.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array containing the possible values of an attribute of type 'OrderedList'.

ClearPending.description: This action is used to clear all the pending values.
ClearPending.longDescription: This action shall perform a clear pending values.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellBootSources.description: BootSources contains properties surrounding a BootSources Attribute Registry (where the system-specific BootSources attributes are described) and the Actions needed to perform changes to BootSources settings, which typically require a system reset to apply.
DellBootSources.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent BootSources attributes for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AttributeRegistry.description: This is the AttributeRegistry for this resource

Attributes.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific list of BootSources attributes.
Attributes.longDescription: BootSources Attribute settings appear as additional properties in this object, and can be looked up in the Attribute Registry by their AttributeName.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Enabled.description: The attribute that is used set if the boot device is Enabled.
Enabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to indicate if the boot device is Enabled.

Id.description: The device ID fo the boot device.
Id.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the device ID for the boot device.

Index.description: The index number of the boot device in the boot order list.
Index.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the index number of the boot device in the boot order list.

Name.description: The fully qualified device descriptor (FQDD) of the boot device.
Name.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the fully qualified device descriptor (FQDD) of the boot device.
